title: VILLAGE ORB / aerograffito afterthought
description: Conceptualization afterthought about the words on the roof!

dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "This phrase is meant to be looked a..."
dialogueTree.text: This phrase is meant to be looked at from above.

links.title: You: ""Hey Kim, who is this rooftop messa..."
links.text: "Hey Kim, who is this rooftop message for?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant cranes his head and..."
links.text: The lieutenant cranes his head and mutters: "GO HOME." He pauses. "It's an *aerograffito*. It's meant for the Coalition aerostatics that keep a lookout on the city from the low troposphere."

links.title: You: "(Wag your finger at the clouds.) "G..."
links.text: (Wag your finger at the clouds.) "GO HOME!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "The sky feels more ominous and thre..."
links.text: The sky feels more ominous and threatening than ever before.

links.title: You: "(Wave at the sky.) "Hello, nice int..."
links.text: (Wave at the sky.) "Hello, nice international community. Thank you for watching over us."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The sky feels more bright and welco..."
links.text: The sky feels more bright and welcoming than ever before.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The sky is indifferent to your sile..."
links.text: The sky is indifferent to your silent nod, but the lieutenant seems to appreciate it. He gives you a fleeting smile.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An aerostatic is an airship. A hyb..."
links.text: "An aerostatic is an airship. A hybrid airship, semi-rigid." He points up to a small dot in the cloudline. "*That* is an aerostatic."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Look," the lieutenant says impatie..."
links.text: "Look," the lieutenant says impatiently. "It's not something that can be explained on the go in couple of sentences. We have more important things to focus on right now, so let's get back to them, alright?"

links.title: You: ""How do they stay up in the air lik..."
links.text: "How do they stay up in the air like that?"

links.title: You: ""There are airships around? Where c..."
links.text: "There are airships around? Where can I get one?!"

links.title: You: ""What the hell is that?" (Point to..."
links.text: "What the hell is that?" (Point to the rooftop message.)
